  • The tools

Personal
Ai Agent

A personal data artificial intelligence agent can help individuals understand and use digitally enabled systems in the real world.

accessibility_new
Agency for people
Publishing place definitons allows people to know what functionality is available in a given place.
power
Interoperable access
Rather than relying on a single app, an interoperable API ensures many channels of access.
receipt
Data exchange receipts
Each personal interaction that is digitally recorded is able to be audited and edited by that person.
place
Zone-based notice
Alerts can be set based on geographic areas and a person’s familiarity with that place.

Choose
your agent

The following scenarios propose a personal AI agent, offered to you by an organization of your choosing.

  • radio_button_checked
    location_city

    City Dept.

    A department in your municipal government

  • radio_button_unchecked
    local_library

    Library Dept.

    A department in your municipal government

  • radio_button_unchecked
    account_balance

    Bank Co.

    A department in your municipal government

  • radio_button_unchecked
    local_phone

    Phone Co.

    A department in your municipal government

  • radio_button_unchecked
    help

    Other...

    Who would you choose to provide your personal AI?

Vision
Designing places for responsible technology
A Vision

How might we design technology in places responsible

The following scenarios walk through how people might have more agency in digitally enabled environments.

start
Grab a book
Rather than relying on a single app, an interoperable API ensures many channels of access.
A new look
Rather than relying on a single app, an interoperable API ensures many channels of access.
Stop to listen
Rather than relying on a single app, an interoperable API ensures many channels of access.

Rather than relying on a single app, an interoperable API ensures many channels of access.
Recycle, recall
Rather than relying on a single app, an interoperable API ensures many channels of access.
Lost & Found
Rather than relying on a single app, an interoperable API ensures many channels of access.
Head home together
Rather than relying on a single app, an interoperable API ensures many channels of access.

Dock your bike
Arriving at your destination, you dock your bike, and your session is ended. The trip is credited to your monthly membership.

  • The purpose of this system is

    Mobility

  • The service is provided by

    Bikeshare Co.

    The user’s symmetrical interface is

    Personal AI
  • favorite

    The relationship with this system is

    Membership
